text:
Thank you,
but Chiyoko was helping just a moment ago...

That was then! It's already done! Right now,
I just want to share the load with you, Natsuha-chan!

Hehe...!
Then I'll help someone else once this is done.

...There's really a lot of food
for the animals on the farm.

Yes, since we can't drive into certain areas,
we have to carry everything by hand. It's tough.

Right! Whether it's hot or cold, rainy or sunny,
we're always taking care of them, right...?!

It's a job where we're entrusted with lives...
It's an honor to be able to help even for just one day.

There's still so much we don't know,
but that's what makes it interesting.
